name: Six Shooter (Sanderhhh)
description: The dice are coming to enact their revenge on the red ball. Will you be able to stand their onslaught? Instructions: WASD to move, left click to shoot. Shoot the dice to add the value on their upper face to the score. Shoot a 6 to gain double points for a few seconds, shoot a 1 to get stunned for a short while.
